item.title: VOA - Could Bitcoin Become a Reserve Currency
item.description: This is my series to learn english. I have a target 6.5 IELTS on next year. So, I’m looking for the most effective way to learn English. I will try my best to learn. I have to get it. These are the articles that I find interesting to read. I just pratice retyping the existing articles. Here is a root article: Could Bitcoin Become a Reserve Currency - by By Dan Novak 17 April 2022 Root Articles or you can find all at: https://www.
